name: openfl
description: A fast, productive library for 2D cross-platform development.

scripts.docker-build: if [[ "$(docker images -q openfl/openfl_js)" == "" ]]; then docker build -t openfl/openfl_js .; fi
scripts.docker-test-build: npm run docker-test-clean && docker build -t openfl/openfl_js_test_$TESTNAME $TESTDIR && npm run docker-test-run
scripts.docker-test-run: docker run -d --name openfljs_test_$TESTNAME -p 8080 openfl/openfl_js_test_$TESTNAME && npm run docker-tests-list
scripts.docker-test-clean: docker ps -a -q --filter "name=openfljs_test_$TESTNAME" | xargs docker stop | xargs docker rm -fv
scripts.docker-tests-clean: docker ps -a -q --filter "name=openfljs_test_*" | xargs docker stop | xargs docker rm -fv
scripts.docker-tests-list: docker ps --format='{{.Names}} {{.Ports}}' --filter 'name=openfljs_test_*' | awk -F'[->]' '{print $1}' | awk -F'[ ]' '{print "http://" $2 " runs "$1 }' && echo && echo after you\'re finished run : npm run docker-tests-clean
